pages.title: Astral Confluence Beacon
pages.text: Located in the Celestial Port, the Astral Confluence Beacon is a grand, imposing device that serves as the nexus for interdimensional travel. It consists of a colossal, rotating orb crafted from void-forged alloy and luminous crystal, channeling stabilized cosmic energy from the Aetherflow Conduit.

pages.title: Functions
pages.text: The Beacon calibrates and stabilizes the energy signatures of interdimensional portals, enabling safe and precise travel. Its holographic interface displays real-time star maps and cosmic flux data, allowing navigators to select destinations and fine-tune portal parameters while reinforcing the Bastionâ€™s defenses against external threats.
